tasks.title: Create GitHub Projects Skill Directory Structure
tasks.description: Set up the initial folder structure and core files for the Claude.ai skill as specified in the PRD.
tasks.details: Create directories: github-projects/, references/, scripts/. Add SKILL.md with overview, instructions for token setup (scopes: repo, project, read:org), and usage examples. Include placeholder config YAML with example projects (DocuGen, AFKBot, WYRE-Internal).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify directory structure matches PRD spec, SKILL.md renders correctly in Claude.ai, config YAML parses validly with js-yaml.

tasks.title: Implement Project Configuration Parser
tasks.description: Parse YAML config to load ProjectConfig interfaces for multiple organizations and projects.
tasks.details: Write TypeScript function to parse config YAML into ProjectConfig[] array. Validate required fields (name, org, projectNumber, repos). Support single repo or repos[]. Use libraries: js-yaml, zod for schema validation. Store in global config object.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests with example configs (single/multi repo, org/user). Test invalid configs throw errors. Snapshot parsed objects match TypeScript interface.

tasks.title: Develop GitHub GraphQL Client with Authentication
tasks.description: Create authenticated GraphQL client for Projects V2 API using user-provided token.
tasks.details: Use graphql-request or apollo-client. Implement token validation (check scopes via /user). Cache project node IDs by org/project_number using GitHub's node(id) query. Handle rate limiting with exponential backoff. Reference: https://docs.github.com/en/issues/planning-and-tracking-with-projects/automating-your-project/using-the-api-to-manage-projects[1].
tasks.testStrategy: Mock GitHub API responses. Test token auth success/failure. Verify project ID resolution for configured projects.

tasks.title: Create GraphQL Queries Reference Document
tasks.description: Document essential GraphQL queries for project fields, items, and status aggregation.
tasks.details: In references/graphql-queries.md: Query project fields (status field ID), project items by status, item details (title, url, labels, updatedAt). Include pagination. Test queries against real project. Add field-mappings.md for status_field_mapping.
tasks.testStrategy: Run queries against test project, verify responses match expected structure (ProjectStatus interface). Save as markdown snippets.

tasks.title: Implement Single Project Status Query Handler
tasks.description: Handle 'What's the status on [project]?' with summary and item lists.
tasks.details: Parse natural language for project name. Query project items grouped by status_field_mapping. Aggregate counts (inProgress, blocked, etc.). Format response matching example interaction. Limit to top 5 items per category.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with mock data for DocuGen project. Verify counts accurate, formatting matches spec, handles unknown projects gracefully.

tasks.title: Build Cross-Project Aggregated Queries
tasks.description: Support 'what's blocking?', 'standup summary', 'open issues count' across all configured projects.
tasks.details: Aggregate queries across ProjectConfig[]. Implement 'what's blocking right now?' (Blocked column/label), 'standup summary' (all projects), total open count. Use parallel API calls with Promise.all().
tasks.testStrategy: Test with multi-project config. Verify aggregation correct, performance under 5s for 5 projects.

tasks.title: Implement Time-Based Status Queries
tasks.description: Add 'what did I ship this week?' and recent completions filtering.
tasks.details: Query closed issues/pulls last 7 days per project. Filter by updatedAt/closedAt. Support 'this week' natural language parsing. Include ProjectItem details.
tasks.testStrategy: Mock date filtering. Test edge cases (no completions, partial week, different timezones).

tasks.title: Develop Issue Creation Functionality
tasks.description: Handle 'Create an issue for [title] in [project]' using REST API.
tasks.details: Use POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues. Auto-select repo from project config. Add labels from config (priority:, type:). Immediately add to project board via GraphQL addProjectV2ItemById.
tasks.testStrategy: Create test issue in test repo/project. Verify issue exists, added to correct project/status.

tasks.title: Implement Project Item Status Updates
tasks.description: Support 'move [task] to [status]' and blocked status setting.
tasks.details: Fuzzy match issue title. Use GraphQL updateProjectV2ItemFieldValue for status field. Map natural language to status_field_mapping values. For blocked: set blockedReason custom field if exists.
tasks.testStrategy: Test status changes on real project items. Verify UI reflects changes immediately.

tasks.title: Add Comment and Note Functionality
tasks.description: Implement 'add note to [task]: [note]' using REST comments API.
tasks.details: Fuzzy search issues by title. POST /issues/{number}/comments. Support threading if reply-to-comment specified.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify comments appear on correct issues. Test fuzzy matching accuracy.

tasks.title: Setup Taskmaster Hook Script Structure
tasks.description: Create standalone TypeScript/Node.js hook script for Taskmaster integration.
tasks.details: ts-node or esbuild for execution. Read config YAML. Parse tasks.json (Taskmaster format). Track sync state in separate sync-state.json. Use same GitHub client as skill.
tasks.testStrategy: Run script with sample tasks.json, verify config loads, sync state initializes.

tasks.title: Implement Taskmaster Tasks to GitHub Issues Mapping
tasks.description: Convert Taskmaster task objects to GitHub issues with proper field mapping.
tasks.details: Map per PRD table: title→title, description+details→body, priority→labels, dependencies→body text 'Depends on #X'. Format testStrategy section. Skip already synced tasks via sync-state.json.
tasks.testStrategy: End-to-end test: input tasks.json → verify created issues match mapping exactly.

tasks.title: Add New Issues to Project Boards with Initial Status
tasks.description: Automatically add created issues to correct project board with Backlog/Ready status.
tasks.details: After issue creation, use GraphQL addProjectV2ItemById. Set initial_status based on dependencies (Ready if none, Backlog if deps exist). Use project_selector logic from config.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify issues appear in correct project/status column. Test dependency-based status logic.

tasks.title: Implement Taskmaster Sync State Management
tasks.description: Track which tasks have been synced to prevent duplicates and store mappings.
tasks.details: Maintain sync-state.json with taskMappings {taskmasterId → {githubIssueNumber, url}}. Check before creating. Update after successful sync. Handle partial failures gracefully.
tasks.testStrategy: Test idempotency: run hook twice on same tasks.json, verify no duplicates.

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Documentation and Examples
tasks.description: Document full setup, usage, and example interactions for both components.
tasks.details: Update SKILL.md with all query patterns. Add references/config-example.md, api-patterns.md. Hook README with npm run sync-tasks command. Include troubleshooting (token scopes, project numbers).
tasks.testStrategy: Validate all documented queries/examples work end-to-end. Create setup checklist.

tasks.title: Add Advanced Features: Milestones and PR Linking
tasks.description: Implement milestone creation and PR-issue linking from Phase 4.
tasks.details: POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/milestones. Parse 'link task #X to PR #Y' → add URL to issue body or use GitHub's PR references. Suggest PR links for in-progress issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Test milestone creation, PR linking updates issue correctly.
